urls.title: Use Chicago as your base to explore more!
urls.description: Chicago has tons of great sights and destinations within a couple of hours of the city. Make your next trip a bit longer and see more than the Windy City. To create a perfect Chicago getaway, Finnair's direct flights let you enjoy the new elevated long-haul experience. Chicago is situated on one of the five Great Lakes, Lake Michigan. It is the only one of the lakes that is entirely on the US side of the border. If you want to see all of it, you could drive around it in a couple of days (or 15 hours

data.text: When you wish to make your travel plans more flexible, we recommend you choose our Flex or Classic ticket. With Finnair Cancellation Coverage, you can get additional coverage in case of sudden sickness, and we also suggest you always have travel insurance. https://t.co/tmm7OtkMQM

urls.title: 3 ways for more flexible travels
urls.description: It is finally easier to hold on to your travel plans as the pandemic has moved to a new phase. However, many of us like having flexibility with travel plans. Valtteri Helve, Head of Finnair product offering, shares his tips for added flexibility when travelling with Finnair. The first step to ensure flexibility for travel plan changes is to choose a ticket type for your needs. “Our Flex ticket is the most flexible one as it is fully refundable in case you need to cancel your trip – and it also allows

data.text: Did you know that by reducing the weight of your baggage by 5 kilograms, you reduce your carbon footprint by about 5 per cent? When it comes to packing light and tight, flight attendants know the best. Our cabin crew member shares her useful packing tips: https://t.co/oUwU2uaaEM

urls.title: Cabin crew tips: The art of packing
urls.description: When it comes to packing light and tight, flight attendants do know best. Cabin crew member Elina Poutanen has a set routine and shares her four tips for fitting it all into a carry-on. Even the most seasoned traveller stresses about what to pack in a carry-on bag. Cabin crew member Elina Poutanen shares four tried and true packing hacks for any trip. “I always start packing by checking the weather forecast. This way I have the right clothes and don’t pack any unnecessary items. I also like to think

urls.title: Tips for travelling during the summer season and peak hours
urls.description: We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season. During the peak hours and busier times, the number of customers at the airports and on our flights increases. Busy times are expected from time to time, and various service points as well as security checks may be congested. Also, this summer quickly increased travel and global labour shortages of airport operators and ground service providers, are causing congestion at many European airports. Below you’ll find some tips on

Today, we are off to Seattle after 33 years! In Seattle, you’ll find beautiful nature, great restaurants, world-famous architecture and lots of museums. However, if you wish to get off the beaten path, check out these best-kept secrets by a Seattle local: https://t.co/61elRpre05

urls.title: Don’t miss these three hidden gems in Seattle
urls.description: Planning a trip to Seattle and want to get off the beaten path? A Seattle local reveals the city’s best-kept secrets. Liz Johnson works at Visit Seattle and knows the Emerald City inside out. We asked Liz what her favourite less known spots are in Seattle. These are her suggestions. The largest commuter ferry network in the United State, the green-and-white ferries connect Seattle to a variety of island communities around Puget Sound. Hop on board to explore beaches, local food and drink, stunning vistas

data.text: @adz333 Hi, please cancel your ticket before the first flight on your reservation departs. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Facemask policy on our flights
urls.description: Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. As coronavirus pandemic is moving to a new phase and coronavirus related restrictions are being removed across countries, we at Finnair are lifting the requirement to wear a face mask on board our flights. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. On flights where using a mask is an authority requirement,

data.text: @misterjapan09 @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience and congestion in our customer service! Could you kindly call our customer service so they can help you with your booking? All the phone numbers are listed on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! -Ada/Finnair

Our direct route to Dallas enables great flight connections to countless destinations within North, Central and South America. Check our best picks of holiday destinations in Mexico, the Caribbeans and Central America that you can easily reach via Dallas: https://t.co/OM8Jcxl1qN

data.text: The new, lightweight Iittala Kuulas tableware is created for Finnair by one of Finland’s foremost living designers, Harri Koskinen. Koskinen knows all about the beauty, form and functionality needed to create the very best in Nordic design. https://t.co/hW79ATzVGT

urls.title: Harri Koskinen: The Finnish designer on bringing his Iittala vision to Finnair
urls.description: As Finland’s foremost living designer, Harri Koskinen knows all about the beauty, form and functionality needed to create the very best in Nordic design. His Block lamp has been part of MoMA’s permanent collection since 2000, while his Muu chair won him the prestigious Compasso d’Oro Award in 2004. Koskinen has also worked with iconic Finnish table and glassware brand Iittala throughout his career, from a scholarship in their glass factory after university in 1996, through to a period as its design

data.text: @GustafTadaa Hi, in Economy, we don't unfortunately have PC power but offer USB ports for charging personal devices. In Premium Economy and Business Class, we have a full suite of power options including PC power and USB, and in our renewed Business Class also wireless charging. -Ada/Finnair
@toramiki Hi, we plan to resume them on 7 July. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@turningleftfor @ItsSCT Thank you for your nice feedback, happy to hear this! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@majorlen Hi, you don't have to pay a change fee, but as stated on our website: "Please note you need to pay the difference between the original and new fare if your ticket is no longer available at its initial price." Some days are also originally more expensive than others. - Ada/Finnair

@AndrewMMacLeod Hi, our digital team is constantly making improvements to Manage booking, and many of the errors have already been fixed there. We have countless different teams at Finnair focusing on different areas, and digital improvement is definitely a very important one. -Ada/Finnair

Finnair Platinum Wing in the non-Schengen side of Helsinki Airport opens its doors again on 1 June! Platinum Wing welcomes Finnair Plus Platinum Lumo and Platinum members as well as oneworld Emerald members with limited opening hours from 11.30 am to 6 pm: https://t.co/UzI3bxjLBg https://t.co/XQbWGNiS5P

urls.title: Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Combining Nordic design, atmosphere and hospitality, our lounges at Helsinki Airport invite you to spend a hassle-free moment before your flight. There are three lounges at Helsinki Airport – Finnair Lounge in the Schengen side and Finnair Business Lounge and Finnair Platinum Wing in the non-Schengen side of the airport.

data.text: @BIGJinLA Hi, I am really sorry about the long waiting times in our customer service channels currently. Could you kindly contact them again. You can find all their phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@icheuropaer Hi, unfortunately not. However, you can buy it from some supermarkets in Finland. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @ItsSCT @turningleftfor Hi, right now we have the renewed cabins and Business Class AirLounge seats on our Singapore, Dallas and New York routes. We will announce the next route soon. Eventually, all our A350 and A330 cabins will be renewed. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@VijayMishraPune @Airbus @FinnairSuomi Hi, I apologise for the delay in answering. The flap of this aircraft has been checked and its structure is normal. So this is a visual illusion. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: Are you travelling with your pet? Once you have booked flights for yourself, please inform us about your pet within 24h via our chatbot. When your pet is travelling in the cabin, the total weight of the pet and its carrier may not exceed 8kg (17lb). https://t.co/YGwvljkmUR

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any

The phone numbers are listed at the end of this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@florensmacario Hi, we are currently experiencing a backlog in our customer service. I'm sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@anijoshev @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience and long waiting times in our customer service! The best ways to reach our customer service are through the chatbot on our website or by calling them. You can find the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@GrlBrowne Hi, we currently have delays in the refund handling. We’ll inform you via email when your refund application has been processed. Our average handling time for refunds is 4–5 weeks. I am sorry for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
